node.text:
Brand strategist @theannelihansson joins me on the heels of our most successful product launch “brand strategy fundamentals” as we discuss positioning.

This led into a conversation about Swedish auto company @volvocars and their sister brand @polestarcars. Watch the video for the rest of our discussion about branding, marketing and positioning.

If you want more information about the course, DM me the word “brand” to save a few bucks during the pre-launch.

#Entrepreneurial #newbusiness #homebasedbusiness #brand #businessquotes #mentorship #businesspassion #entrepreneursofinstagram #businessmen #mobilebusinesseducation #entrepreneurslife #entrepreneurmotivation #growyourbusiness #creativebusiness #businesscoaching #businessonline #womaninbusiness #successtip #businessstrategy #businesspartner #businesstip #businessideas #instagramforbusiness #smallbusinessmarketing #branding #marketing #positioning #businesstraining

node.text:
I had @manychat CEO Mike Yan (aka Kylo Ren) on talking about how you can use automation to increase engagement, build an email list and even integrate with SMS text messages.

Now til the end of August, you can sign up for a free 90 day trial. It’s fun, intuitive and powerful.

Resist the dark side of the force (dumb auto responders). Go to the light side and use smart automation that sounds and behaves just like you do.

DM the word “tour” if you want to sign up for the Futur Pro zoom tour Tuesday, Aug 17, 9am PDT.

#chatautomation #manychat #igtips #igautomation #socialmediamarketing #igtricks #igtipsandtricks

node.title: Big News! Chat automation is open to everyone

node.text:
@nidhitewarilcsw is a licensed social worker who helps others process trauma and anxiety. She’s my guest on this live stream.

We talk about imposter syndrome, critique strategies and the anxiety we feel before important events.

She’ll be speaking to the #futurpro community on weds at 8am PDT. If you are interested in joining us, dm me the word “Pro” to get more information.

#mentalhealthsupport #impostersyndrome #limitingbeliefs #limitingbelief #negativeselftalk #affirmationsoftheday

node.text:
In this video I talk about what it means to be in charge and taking care of people in your charge. This is the story of how @matthewencina quit @thefuturishere and why I’m happy for him.

node.text:
My friend Alex Preston was a freelance designer who lived with severe food allergies and medical conditions all his life.

He managed the best he could until he got so sick he was bed ridden in the hospital. What he does next is truly inspiring and a lesson for us all.

What obstacles have you had to overcome? What lesson did you learn?

node.text:
Who can you trust? How to avoid fake gurus and what Mike Winnet calls “contrepreneurs”. They all follow a very specific formula to sell you a pipe dream—

You don’t need any special skill. You don’t need to posses any talent. Anybody can do it. It requires no money and little work and you can do it from anywhere by doing this one thing. Sigh.

Recently I was on the Millionaire Secrets podcast with @jefflernerofficial. We got into a fascinating and critical discussion as to why most creatives, designers (and entrepreneurs in general) will always struggle...
​​
​​...and never truly hit the big time. You can watch the full video on Jeff’s YouTube channel or on his podcast. Link in bio.

node.text:
The reason why we don’t share our story is because we aren’t very good at recognizing our own unique gifts and talents.

We let the fear of disappointing someone that holds great emotional power over us, prevent us from doing exactly what we need to do. I want to encourage you to step into the light and shine on. The world is waiting. Parts of this story was inspired by @matt_essam (who I’m happy to learn from).

node.title: The One Thing I Wished I Knew

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on September 07, 2021. May be a black-and-white image of text that says 'SIZE MATTERS. Jule Kim adviceactually.com ©2021'.

node.text:
Size matters. Length matters.

Don’t take my word for it. Today’s guest post is by the SEO queen @itsjulekim. Follow her for more useful tips on optimizing organic reach.

If you know what you’re doing, you can say a lot in 60 seconds or say little in an hour. The golden rule is be economical with your words. Don’t be overly verbose. Say it simply. Your audience and their shrinking attention spans will thank you for it.

node.text:
Pocket Full of Do would have never been written if it weren’t for a few factors.

After many years of producing content, fans and friends encouraged me to write a book. Which, by the way, is no easy undertaking.

To test the idea, I launched a Kickstarter campaign with a goal of raising $30k. I figured that if I couldn’t sell that many copies worth of books, it’s not worth writing. What surprised me was the amount of support that I received. We not only hit our fundraising goal but sold over $70k worth of books.

Five of our friends even backed it with $1k contributions. I think the quality of the book is good. But, I don’t think that’s why people backed us. It’s because when you give without expecting anything in return, it builds up good will.

People genuinely appreciate it. And when you ask for something eventually, they show up to support you. Thank you to everyone who shows up. Appreciate you.

Check link in bio to order a copy of my book.

node.text:
Be my guest. No. Really.

If you want to submit a guest post for other content creators, pay attention to these tips from @thechristosnikas. Follow him for more.

There’s no guarantee that what you submit will be used or that you will attract followers, but your odds will increase if you pay attention to what audience the host attracts, their tone of voice and their design style. If you work within those guidelines and create something memorable and unique your chances increase.

Have you tried guest posting before? What has been your experience?

node.text:
Colors can be tricky. Often times, people choose colors that make it difficult to read text.

Here’s a simple way to test if there’s enough separation and contrast in your color palette.

Today’s guest post is by @sehbancreates. Follow him for more tips like this.

node.text:
Keep learning. Keep going. Advice for young creatives from a career in design.

This guest post is by @rightbrainedhuman and part of a series. Go follow her account for more posts like this.

If you cool go back in time and advise your younger self, what would you say?

#Entrepreneurial #newbusiness #homebasedbusiness #successtips #businessquotes #mentorship #businesspassion #entrepreneursofinstagram #businessmen #mobilebusinesseducation #entrepreneurslife #entrepreneurmotivation #growyourbusiness #creativebusiness #businesscoaching #businessonline #womaninbusiness #successtip #businessstrategy #businesspartner #businesstip #businessideas #instagramforbusiness #smallbusinessmarketing #mobilebusiness #businessconsultant #inspirationbusiness #businesstraining

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Be Resilient Creative industries can look pretty glitzy from the outside but require a lot of hard work. You may have to work constantly work under pressure face creative roadblocks, and still deliver on time, every time. These challenges can be pretty scary; power through unless they are against your values. Swipe @rightbrainedhuman @rightbai 2021 © Apeksha Gupta'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'It 's always a no-till the time you ask. Do not be shy; ask about opportunities that excite you or a problem that is bothering you. Ask for support, ask for help, ask questions, ask a lot of them. When your team mates look at you, they should see curiosity, not disinterest. Swipe @rightbrainedhuman 2021 © Apeksha Gupta'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Be a hustler, no shortcuts. Be a troubleshooter, have a solution-oriented mindset. Instead of saying, "But do not know how to do that," Google it and get something done. Being self-motivated can inject confidence in you and energize those around you. Swipe @rightbrainedhuman 2021 ©ApekshaGupta © Apeksha'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Consider critical feedback. Instead of taking the harsh feedback personally, tune out the negativity and pick the parts that can help you grow. This may be easier said than done, but once we learn to recognize our weaknesses, it becomes easy to work on them. Swipe @rightbrainedhuman 2021 © Apeksha Gupta'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Take ownership. Put things into action and uphold the needs of your client/team/manager. Show genuine interest in your daily activities and understand the purpose of your job role. Think about how you can make a difference, what you need to do to make it happen and how your work benefit those who need it. Swipe @rightbrainedhuman 2021 © Apeksha Gupta'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 21, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Share ideas and keep getting better. Do not hold back on sharing an idea that could lead to a great creative accomplishment or improvement. Keep learning new things and educating yourself. A broader area of interest will allow you to have a fresh perspective on things and everyone loves that! Swipe @rightbrainedhuman 2021 © Apeksha Gupta'.

node.text:
Brand strategist @theannelihansson joins me on the heels of our most successful product launch “brand strategy fundamentals” as we discuss positioning.

This led into a conversation about Swedish auto company @volvocars and their sister brand @polestarcars. Watch the video for the rest of our discussion about branding, marketing and positioning.

If you want more information about the course, DM me the word “brand” to save a few bucks during the pre-launch.

node.text:
You’re doing great. Just keep going.

Today’s guest post and reminder is by @rightbrainedhuman. Follow her for more posts like these.

What’s one thing you’d tell your younger self? For me, it would be to get on the content game as soon as possible. It will work out.

node.text:
Talking to clients can be difficult. It doesn’t have to be. Learn how to be a great communicator with these 6 tips.

Today’s guest post is by @thejamiebrindle. If you want his free, 16 templates on how to talk to clients, check the link in his bio.

Did you find these scripts to be helpful? What scenario or topic do you find to be the most difficult to talk about?

node.text:
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Laozi from the Dao De Jing.

Everyone seeks wisdom. From my observation, wisdom comes from experience and reflection. You must do things and think about the things you’ve done in order to be wise.

Today’s guest post is from @rightbrainedhuman and is a good example of taking small steps that ultimately lead to bigger things. Go follow her for more content like this.

What’s a small win you are proud of? Let’s celebrate them together.

#Entrepreneurial #newbusiness #homebasedbusiness #successtips #businessquotes #mentorship #businesspassion #entrepreneursofinstagram #businessmen #mobilebusinesseducation #entrepreneurslife #entrepreneurmotivation #growyourbusiness #creativebusiness #businesscoaching #businessonline #womaninbusiness #successtip #businessstrategy #businesspartner #businesstip #businessideas #instagramforbusiness #smallbusinessmarketing #mobilebusiness #businessconsultant #inspirationbusiness #businesstraining

node.text:
People don’t fall in love with corporations. They fall in love with personalities.— @yosantosa

When brands lose their way, they fall out of touch with what makes them human and relatable. They lose the founders story and the connection they have with the customers.

Today’s guest post is by brand strategist @theannelihansson. Follow her for great tips on branding and brand strategy.

Who do your customers dream of becoming? What’s getting in their way? How can you help?

#Entrepreneurial #newbusiness #homebasedbusiness #successtips #businessquotes #mentorship #businesspassion #entrepreneursofinstagram #businessmen #mobilebusinesseducation #entrepreneurslife #entrepreneurmotivation #growyourbusiness #creativebusiness #businesscoaching #businessonline #womaninbusiness #successtip #businessstrategy #businesspartner #businesstip #businessideas #instagramforbusiness #smallbusinessmarketing #mobilebusiness #businessconsultant #inspirationbusiness #businesstraining

node.text:
Content creation or content marketing can feel like a chore to do if you’re a creative. But it doesn’t have to be.

Learn how to repurpose your content and be omnipresent on social media with this helpful guide from @chykalophia. Follow them for more tips like this.

In case you haven’t noticed, I’ve spent a lot of time hosting rooms on #Clubhouse giving my team hours of material to work with for podcasts, blog posts, #reels and #shorts. What’s your content marketing strategy? Is it working for you?

#mentorship #businesspassion #entrepreneursofinstagram #mobilebusinesseducation #entrepreneurslife #entrepreneurmotivation #growyourbusiness #creativebusiness #businesscoaching #businessonline #womaninbusiness #successtip #businessstrategy #businesstip #businessideas #instagramforbusiness #smallbusinessmarketing #mobilebusiness #businessconsultant #inspirationbusiness

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be a cartoon of one or more people, phone and text.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'LET'S AGREE To DISAGREE: Creating content is hard J Insights kp #cklph cklph.com @chykalophia'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be an image of ‎body of water and ‎text that says '‎JUST IMAGINE IF YOU COULD CREATE A SINGLE CONTENT AND EXPAND IT TO 10 TYPES OF CONTENT... る Wouldn't that free ১る up more of your time? 1 ১ ל I‎'‎‎.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'clubhouse Start with a Clubhouse room. But not one of those spontaneous one. Do the work upfront. Plan a room that will provide value to the audience in your room.'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Use this framework: P PIQUE AN INTEREST Create a room title with Results Objections Time formula. For example: 2x Your Site's Conversions Without Learning Code, or Build Functional eCommerse Website in 2 Months. M Provide a brief description on who the event is for MAKE IT RELATABLE and one takeaway they'll get from it in the event description. S SHARE THE GEMS Include 3 5 solutions to the topic's problem, the audience's pain point, and the outcome of the solution. Insights @chykalophia #cklph cklph.com'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Invite audience to ask questions and open a discussion. Doing so will allow you to validate whether this topic resonates with others, and what questions they may still have that you may be able to help answer. Insights @chykalophia #cklph cklph.com'.

Photo by Chris Do—IG Business Marketing on August 10, 2021.
